attributes.action: Reveal the truth that the terrorist attacks of 7/7/05 were an inside job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The security services carried out the terrorist attacks of 7 July 2005 in order to provoke a suitable climate of fear preparatory to introducing draconian new laws abrogating our freedoms. I urge the PM to investigate this and report back to the British people.
